definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: What does pop music do for us that's very helpful?
sentences.chinese: 就這點而言流行音樂對我們來說有什麼用處呢？

sentences.english: Do you like any pop music in particular?
sentences.chinese: 你有特別喜歡的流行音樂嗎？

sentences.english: Esquire magazine named her the best voice in the history of pop music.
sentences.chinese: 君子雜誌稱她的嗓音是流行音樂歷史上最好的聲音。

sentences.english: Julia keeps up to date with all the latest pop record releases.
sentences.chinese: 朱麗婭收集了最近發行的所有流行音樂的唱片。

sentences.english: That pop group has had many hits.
sentences.chinese: 那個流行音樂演唱隊多次獲得成功。

sentences.english: A few things strike me as I spin discs from Classical to trip hop.
sentences.chinese: 很少東西可以令我從古典音樂聽到流行音樂。

sentences.english: With so many words said I forget the pop music.
sentences.chinese: 說來說去，我把流行音樂漏掉了。

sentences.english: The singers wiggled their hips to the sound of the pop music.
sentences.chinese: 歌手們隨着流行音樂扭動着屁股。

sentences.english: I have a preferance for pop music.
From Luo Ta-you to Cui Jian is the first book devoted to critiques of popular music to come to the bookstores.
sentences.chinese: 翁嘉銘的流行音樂評論卻是另一種不同的參與方式。

sentences.english: This is the chart-topping record opf this week.
sentences.chinese: 這是本週最暢銷流行音樂唱片名列榜首的唱片。

sentences.english: But I am also a fan of pop music, especially English songs.
sentences.chinese: 但我也是一個流行音樂的歌迷，特別是英文歌曲。

sentences.english: I like listening to pop music and going to discos .
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡聽流行音樂，上迪斯科舞廳。

sentences.english: That’s the definition of pop music.
sentences.chinese: 這就是流行音樂的定義。

sentences.english: Do you like Chinese pop music?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡華文流行音樂嗎？

sentences.english: My ignorance biased me against popular music.
sentences.chinese: 我由於無知而對流行音樂抱有偏見。

definition: speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]/(music) rapping
